scripts.ufc:data:pull: cd scripts/ufc-data && deno run --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write main.ts pull
scripts.ufc:data:import: cd scripts/ufc-data && deno run --allow-net --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write main.ts import
scripts.ufc:data:pull-and-import: cd scripts/ufc-data && deno run --allow-net --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write main.ts pull-and-import
scripts.ufc:data:list: cd scripts/ufc-data && deno run --allow-read main.ts list
